en-US.summary: Trivia game to test how well you know who tweeted
examplePhrases: Alexa tell who tweeted to start a game
Alexa tell who tweeted I want to play
en-US.name: Who Tweeted
en-US.description: Are you a savvy twitter follower?  Can you distinguish tweets by who tweeted them?  Test your knowledge with this Alexa skill to find out how well you do.
